long_description: a place to enjoy nature, learn about horses, goats and cattle. we are a small farm located in glastonbury, connecticut. we offer horseback riding lessons, after school/ afternoon programs, horse share programs, summer programs, pony rides, introductory riding lessons, farm visits, photography locations, and other custom events. tired of sitting at home on the weekends. whether you want to ride, spend time with or just experience horses and the farm we are focused on providing a low key place for you to meet our horses and goats.

generated_description: hidden meadow equestrian center is a small farm located in glastonbury, connecticut that offers horseback riding lessons, after school/afternoon programs, horse share programs, summer programs, pony rides, introductory riding lessons and farm visits, photography locations, and other custom events. the center is focused on providing a low-key place for visitors to meet horses and goats and experience the farm life. they offer an hour-long lesson with 30 minutes of ride time, which teaches riders how to brush, tack and prepare the horse for riding as well as take care of the horse after the lesson. the farm also offers pony rides and farm tours for those who want to get a taste of the farmlife and meet the goats and horses.
